About.paragraph: ViveHome is a smart home monitoring system designed for real-time health data tracking. It integrates a smartwatch, main screen, and additional screens to monitor and protect your health in the comfort of your home.
Why: No more blind spots in health tracking.
Why2: Highly scalable system for any home size.

Scenario1.title: Small Home (20-40m²) - 1 Screen and 1 Watch
Scenario1.paragraph: In small homes (20-40m²), ViveHome works with a single 10-meter coverage area, offering basic health tracking through a combination of the ViveHome System (Main Screen) and the ViveHome Watch for the user. This compact system provides constant monitoring in real-time, ensuring safety at home.
Scenario1.paragraphB: With a compact and intuitive design, the system monitors vital signs such as heart rate, oxygen levels, and body temperature. In case of any emergency, alerts are sent to the user's caregivers or loved ones.

Scenario2.title: Medium-Sized Home (50-100m²) - 1 Main Screen, 1 Extra Screen, and 1 Watch
Scenario2.paragraph: For medium-sized homes (50-100m²), the system expands to two screens with an additional extra screen. With a 20-meter coverage area, the ViveHome system tracks health data across multiple rooms and provides notifications to caregivers if there are any anomalies or when the user moves between zones.
Scenario2.paragraphB: The integration of the ViveHome Watch ensures continuous health tracking, while the extra screen provides additional data and insights, enhancing the overall experience and monitoring coverage.

Scenario3.title: Large Home (100-200m²) - 1 Main Screen, 3 Extra Screens, and 1 Watch
Scenario3.paragraph: In large homes (100-200m²), the ViveHome system becomes even more powerful. With a main screen, three extra screens, and the ViveHome Watch, the entire house is covered with a 40-meter+ radius of health monitoring. Users can rest assured that their health is continuously being tracked throughout their home.
Scenario3.paragraphB: With the ability to monitor multiple rooms simultaneously, the system ensures no areas are left unmonitored. The safety zones are dynamically adjusted to the user's location within the home, providing real-time updates on vital health data.

Executive.title: Executive Summary
Executive.paragraph: ViveHome is a leading health and safety solution for homes, providing comprehensive monitoring systems for the elderly and individuals with chronic health conditions. With scalable features, the system can adapt to any home size while maintaining real-time tracking of health data, emergency alerts, and seamless communication between caregivers and family members.

Problem.title: Problem & Solution
Problem.paragraph: There is a significant gap in home safety and health monitoring, especially for individuals who are elderly or suffering from chronic health conditions. Traditional methods of tracking health are inadequate, leaving many without the peace of mind they deserve. ViveHome solves this problem by providing an integrated system that monitors vital health signs in real-time, detects anomalies, and alerts caregivers when necessary.

System.title: How the System Works
System.paragraph: The ViveHome system combines the use of a smartwatch and screens placed throughout the home to provide continuous monitoring of health data. The smartwatch tracks vital health signs such as heart rate, temperature, oxygen levels, and more. The main and extra screens display real-time data and receive alerts in case of any emergency.
small: One main screen for tracking health.
Single smartwatch to monitor the user’s vital signs.
Immediate alerts sent in case of health anomalies.
medium: Main screen and extra screen for wider coverage.
User's health data displayed in multiple rooms.
Alert system that notifies caregivers in real-time.
large: Multiple screens for comprehensive home coverage.
Health tracking and alerts across several zones of the house.
AI-powered health analysis for predictive alerts.

ProductScreenLight.title: Screen - Light Mode
ProductScreenLight.paragraph: The ViveHome screen in light mode offers a clear and intuitive interface, ideal for daytime use. It provides real-time health monitoring, emergency alerts, and an easy-to-read dashboard to track all vital signs.

ProductScreenDark.title: Screen - Dark Mode
ProductScreenDark.paragraph: The ViveHome screen in dark mode is designed for night-time use, reducing eye strain while maintaining all the essential functionalities. The contrast ensures visibility in low-light conditions, providing seamless monitoring 24/7.

ProductWatch.title: ViveHome Watch
ProductWatch.paragraph: The ViveHome Watch is a lightweight, waterproof device designed for constant health tracking. It monitors heart rate, oxygen levels, and temperature while seamlessly integrating with the ViveHome screens for real-time updates.

RadioSection.title: Screen Coverage Area
RadioSection.paragraph: Each ViveHome screen covers a radius of 10 meters, ensuring that no health data is lost. Multiple screens can be strategically placed throughout the house to guarantee full coverage, especially in larger homes.
